title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Jul 5 2022
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Jul 5 2022
description:
Why #BuckSexton Was Trending Over the 4th of July Holiday Weekend. Fox's Gianno Caldwell on His Brother Christian's Murder and the Continued Unchecked Bloodshed in Chicago. Clay Takes ESPN, Writer to Task Over Woke, Anti-American July 4 Column: "How does this piece serve sports fans?" The Heartwarming Story We All Need to Hear.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
